name: Swiss Chard with Garbanzo Beans and Fresh Tomatoes
author: Syd
summary: Beans and greens are a perfect combination, earthy and satisfying. This recipe for Swiss chard with garbanzo beans, onion, and fresh tomatoes is brightened with lemon juice and makes a perfect vegetarian main dish or a tantalizing side dish for fish or meat.
ingredients: 1 bunch red Swiss chard, rinsed and chopped
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet
Stir in shallot and green onions; cook and stir for 3 to 5 minutes, or until soft and fragrant
Stir in garbanzo beans, and season with salt and pepper; heat through
Place chard in pan, and cook until wilted
Add tomato slices, squeeze lemon juice over greens, and heat through
Plate, and season with salt and pepper to taste
